name: Codename Cygnus - an Interactive Radio Drama for iOS
blurb: Play as a secret agent in an interactive fictional world inspired by old time radio dramas.

rewards.reward: CYGNUS ASSET - Credit in-game and on our website as a backer as well as access to private Kickstarter updates. You'll be the first to receive news about the game before it goes public.

CYGNUS MISSION HANDLER - All the episodes of Mission 1, including the Prologue and three Main Episodes scheduled for release at launch, as well as two Sidequest Episodes scheduled for release in September. IMPORTANT NOTE: To play the game you will need an iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch with iOS 6.0+. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS)

CYGNUS CODEBREAKER - A limited edition copy of the Cygnus Field Agent Codebook (numbered digital copy). This will enable you to decode secret messages dropped in various locations on the Internet by Cygnus characters. We also have plans to include secret messages in upcoming episodes. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS)
CYGNUS WIRETAPPER - Receive a digital copy of a top secret bloopers reel from voiceover sessions and a personalized audio thank you email from the Cygnus team. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS)

CYGNUS FIELD AGENT I - Name something in the game: hotel, bar, drink, gadget, company, etc. We'll take your suggestion and work it into an upcoming episode of the series. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS)

CYGNUS FIELD AGENT I (Version 2.0) - Receive an electronic copy of a full 3-minute version of the Codename Cygnus Theme, created specifically for our backers by our composer Li Xiao'an. Version 1.0 backers and all pledges tiers will also receive a copy. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS)
CYGNUS FIELD AGENT II - A Codename Cygnus t-shirt in your size. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I)
CYGNUS DOUBLE AGENT - A personalized Codename Cygnus t-shirt with your chosen agent name on it. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS AUDIO SPECIALIST I - An audiobook "radio drama" version of your favorite episode of Mission 1 prepared using the character traits and choices you prefer. You'll also receive a PDF copy of the script for that episode. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS AUDIO SPECIALIST II - An audiobook "radio drama" version of the Prologue and all three Mission 1 main episodes prepared using the character traits and choices you prefer. You'll also receive a PDF copy of all Mission 1 episode scripts. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS TOP SECRET LEVEL I CLEARANCE -  (TESTER) Be part of the beta team for the entire life of the game. You'll receive access to play the game before anyone else as we near our launch date. After that, you can remain in the beta and play new episodes for free prior to their live release. You'll also see new, experimental game features prior to public release. IMPORTANT NOTE: To play the game you will need an iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch with iOS 6.0+. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS TOP SECRET LEVEL II CLEARANCE  (ACTOR) Be part of the production team for a short period, meet with the team in conference calls, and get direction to record a voiceover line that will be included in an upcoming episode of the series. You'll receive in-game credit as a Voice Actor for that episode, a copy of the script for that episode, and as a beta member you'll hear yourself in the game before anyone else. We'll also give you a free copy of the episode. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS TOP SECRET LEVEL III CLEARANCE - (WRITER) Work with the studio and its writers to name and create a character in the Codename Cygnus series. You'll receive an advance copy of the script for the episode in which the character appears, as well as sound files of the actor's recording session for the episode. (INCLUDES ALL THE ABOVE REWARDS EXCEPT FOR FIELD AGENT I & II)

CYGNUS SPYMASTER - As a premiere Cygnus benefactor, you will be honored with SPYMASTER status as a backer in-game and on our website. You will also receive in-game listing as an Associate Producer of Reactive Studios. Additionally, we'll schedule a conference call with you and the team so we can thank you personally. (INCLUDES ALL OTHER REWARDS)
